qas.question: WHERE ARE SUPERCELL GAMES AVAILABLE?
qas.answer: Our games are globally available for free on iOS or Android phones and tablets. To start playing one of our games, the game's app has to be downloaded to the device via the Play Store (Android) or App Store (Apple). So far, we've launched five games globally: Hay Day, Clash of Clans, Boom Beach, Clash Royale and Brawl Stars.

qas.question: WHAT ARE THE AGE LIMITS FOR SUPERCELL GAMES?
qas.answer: Our games do not have general age limits. However, users of our games should observe that, under our Terms of Service, users under the legal age of majority in the country of their residence require their legal guardian’s approval of our Terms of Service before registering their account.

qas.question: PRIVACY AND PROCESSING OF PERSONAL DATA
qas.answer: Players are asked to set up a username during the game's tutorial. We recommend that players choose a nickname not directly identifiable to their real-life person to increase security and privacy. We do not store any credit card information related to in-game purchases as the payment transactions are completed through Apple's App Store or Google Play.

qas.question: HOW DOES CHAT WORK IN SUPERCELL GAMES?
qas.answer: All Supercell games have an in-game chat functionality. Players can talk to other players by joining a team. There is also a global chat in Clash of Clans. Safety features include warnings against sharing personal information and tools to report inappropriate behavior.

qas.question: HOW TO REPORT AN ISSUE?
qas.answer: If you or your child come across a user that is not following Supercell's Safe and Fair Play Policy, report them by opening the game's chat, finding the message/player you wish to report, tapping the message, and choosing 'Report'.

qas.question: ARE SUPERCELL GAMES FREE TO PLAY?
qas.answer: All Supercell games are free to download, offering optional 'in-app purchases'. In-app purchases are never required to play the game, but can be used to enhance certain gameplay elements.

qas.question: CAN I MANAGE OR TURN OFF IN-APP PURCHASES?
qas.answer: As long as no payment information is added to your child's device, no purchases can be made. You can adjust password protection settings or disable in-app purchases entirely afterwards.

qas.question: WHO PROCESSES IN-APP PURCHASES?
qas.answer: Supercell does not process payments for in-app purchases. Payment transactions are processed through the App Store or Google Play via the personal email address associated with that account.

qas.question: ARE MY BANK DETAILS KEPT PRIVATE?
qas.answer: We don't process payments for in-app purchases, nor do we have access to any of your payment information. Payment transactions are completed through Apple's App Store or Google Play.

qas.question: I'VE MADE AN IN-GAME PURCHASE, BUT I HAVEN'T RECEIVED WHAT I PAID FOR. WHAT NOW?
qas.answer: Usually transactions are instant, but it can take up to 48 hours for transactions to process. If nothing happens after 48 hours, contact Apple or Google directly.

qas.question: MY CHILD ACCIDENTALLY MADE AN IN-APP PURCHASE. CAN I GET A REFUND?
qas.answer: Items bought in our games are non-refundable. For purchases made on an iOS device, visit Apple support. For Android, contact us directly through in-game support.

qas.question: WHERE DO I FIND MY PURCHASE HISTORY?
qas.answer: For Android, enter payments.google.com and log in to view your Play Store order history. For iOS, open iTunes, select your username, and view 'Purchase History'.

qas.question: I’VE SEEN ANOTHER SITE THAT OFFERS IN-GAME PRODUCTS FOR SUPERCELL GAMES. CAN I BUY FROM THEM?
qas.answer: The only way to make an in-app purchase is through the game itself on your mobile device. Beware of third-party sites that promise enhancements.

qas.question: I’VE RECEIVED A BILL FOR A PURCHASE I DIDN’T MAKE. WHAT SHOULD I DO IF I SUSPECT FRAUDULENT ACTIVITY?
qas.answer: If you suspect fraudulent activity, contact Apple or Google immediately. If they direct you to us, email transactions@supercell.com with specific details.

qas.question: HOW CAN I CONTACT SUPERCELL?
qas.answer: You can contact us directly from within the game or via email at parents@supercell.com. We do not offer support via phone.
